headline: Pepsi (PEP): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Pepsi on Rebound Capital’s Substack. As of 5ᵗʰ July, Pepsi’s share was trading at $135.38. PEP’s trailing and forward P/E were 19.91 and 15.69 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Pepsi is a consumer goods company that has underperformed its competitor, Coca-Cola, in recent years. While Coca-Cola has gone […]

headline: PepsiCo's Productivity Plan: A Cure for Cost Headwinds?
summary: PEP accelerates automation and productivity efforts to counter inflation and supply chain pressures in 2025.

headline: India Coke bottler Kandhari expands with Wave Beverages acquisition
summary: In a brief statement on LinkedIn, Kandhari said the move “significantly enhances our operational footprint in Punjab and Himachal Pradesh”.

headline: Coca-Cola Is a Great Company, But I Think This Stock Is a Better Investment
summary: Coca-Cola is one of the most recognized brands in the world.  Coca-Cola's business is well-run and performing relatively strongly right now.  Investors are well aware of Coca-Cola's strengths, which makes this consumer staples peer more attractive.
